sqlQuery.name: all
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT organisms.name AS term, (SELECT apidb.tab_to_string(CAST(COLLECT(trim(to_char(taxon_id))) AS apidb.varchartab), ', ') AS internal FROM sres.taxon CONNECT BY prior taxon_id = parent_id START WITH taxon_id = organisms.internal_taxon) AS internal FROM (SELECT tn.name, t.taxon_id AS internal_taxon FROM sres.TaxonName tn, sres.taxon t WHERE tn.name_class='scientific name' AND t.taxon_id = tn.taxon_id AND t.rank = 'species' AND t.taxon_id IN (SELECT taxon_id FROM sres.taxon CONNECT BY taxon_id = prior parent_id START WITH taxon_id IN ( SELECT ns.taxon_id FROM dots.NaSequence ns, dots.GeneFeature gf WHERE gf.na_sequence_id = ns.na_sequence_id UNION SELECT ns.taxon_id FROM dots.NaSequence ns, sres.SequenceOntology so WHERE so.sequence_ontology_id = ns.sequence_ontology_id AND so.term_name IN ('contig', 'supercontig', 'chromosome')))) organisms, (SELECT 'Cryptosporidium hominis' AS name, 1 AS rank FROM dual UNION SELECT 'Cryptosporidium parvum' AS name, 2 AS rank FROM dual UNION SELECT 'Plasmodium falciparum' AS name, 3 AS rank FROM dual UNION SELECT 'Plasmodium vivax' AS name, 4 AS rank FROM dual UNION SELECT 'Plasmodium yoelii' AS name, 5 AS rank FROM dual) partial_ordering WHERE organisms.name = partial_ordering.name(+) ORDER BY partial_ordering.rank, organisms.name

sqlQuery.name: withChromosomes
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT organisms.name AS term, (SELECT apidb.tab_to_string(CAST(COLLECT(trim(to_char(taxon_id))) AS apidb.varchartab), ', ') AS internal FROM sres.taxon CONNECT BY prior taxon_id = parent_id START WITH taxon_id = organisms.internal_taxon) AS internal FROM (SELECT tn.name, t.taxon_id AS internal_taxon FROM sres.TaxonName tn, sres.taxon t WHERE tn.name_class='scientific name' AND t.taxon_id = tn.taxon_id AND t.rank = 'species' AND tn.name IN ('Cryptosporidium parvum')) organisms ORDER BY organisms.name

SELECT organisms.name AS term, (SELECT apidb.tab_to_string(CAST(COLLECT(trim(to_char(taxon_id))) AS apidb.varchartab), ', ') AS internal FROM sres.taxon CONNECT BY prior taxon_id = parent_id START WITH taxon_id = organisms.internal_taxon) AS internal FROM (SELECT tn.name, t.taxon_id AS internal_taxon FROM sres.TaxonName tn, sres.taxon t WHERE tn.name_class='scientific name' AND t.taxon_id = tn.taxon_id AND t.rank = 'species' AND tn.name IN ('Toxoplasma gondii')) organisms ORDER BY organisms.name

SELECT organisms.name AS term, (SELECT apidb.tab_to_string(CAST(COLLECT(trim(to_char(taxon_id))) AS apidb.varchartab), ', ') AS internal FROM sres.taxon CONNECT BY prior taxon_id = parent_id START WITH taxon_id = organisms.internal_taxon) AS internal FROM (SELECT tn.name, t.taxon_id AS internal_taxon FROM sres.TaxonName tn, sres.taxon t WHERE tn.name_class='scientific name' AND t.taxon_id = tn.taxon_id AND t.rank = 'species' AND tn.name IN ('Plasmodium falciparum')) organisms ORDER BY organisms.name

SELECT organisms.name AS term, (SELECT apidb.tab_to_string(CAST(COLLECT(trim(to_char(taxon_id))) AS apidb.varchartab), ', ') AS internal FROM sres.taxon CONNECT BY prior taxon_id = parent_id START WITH taxon_id = organisms.internal_taxon) AS internal FROM (SELECT tn.name, t.taxon_id AS internal_taxon FROM sres.TaxonName tn, sres.taxon t WHERE tn.name_class='scientific name' AND t.taxon_id = tn.taxon_id AND t.rank = 'species' AND tn.name IN ('Giardia intestinalis')) organisms ORDER BY organisms.name

SELECT organisms.name AS term, (SELECT apidb.tab_to_string(CAST(COLLECT(trim(to_char(taxon_id))) AS apidb.varchartab), ', ') AS internal FROM sres.taxon CONNECT BY prior taxon_id = parent_id START WITH taxon_id = organisms.internal_taxon) AS internal FROM (SELECT tn.name, t.taxon_id AS internal_taxon FROM sres.TaxonName tn, sres.taxon t WHERE tn.name_class='scientific name' AND t.taxon_id = tn.taxon_id AND t.rank = 'species' AND tn.name IN ('Trichomonas vaginalis')) organisms ORDER BY organisms.name

sqlQuery.name: withGenomicSeq
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT organisms.name AS term, (SELECT apidb.tab_to_string(CAST(COLLECT(trim(to_char(taxon_id))) AS apidb.varchartab), ', ') AS internal FROM sres.taxon CONNECT BY prior taxon_id = parent_id START WITH taxon_id = organisms.internal_taxon) AS internal FROM (SELECT tn.name, t.taxon_id AS internal_taxon FROM sres.TaxonName tn, sres.taxon t WHERE tn.name_class='scientific name' AND t.taxon_id = tn.taxon_id AND t.rank = 'species' AND t.taxon_id IN (SELECT taxon_id FROM sres.taxon CONNECT BY taxon_id = prior parent_id START WITH taxon_id IN (SELECT ns.taxon_id FROM dots.NaSequence ns, sres.SequenceOntology so WHERE so.sequence_ontology_id = ns.sequence_ontology_id AND so.term_name IN ('contig', 'supercontig', 'chromosome')))) organisms, (SELECT 'Cryptosporidium hominis' AS name, 1 AS rank FROM dual UNION SELECT 'Cryptosporidium parvum' AS name, 2 AS rank FROM dual UNION SELECT 'Plasmodium falciparum' AS name, 3 AS rank FROM dual UNION SELECT 'Plasmodium vivax' AS name, 4 AS rank FROM dual UNION SELECT 'Plasmodium yoelii' AS name, 5 AS rank FROM dual) partial_ordering WHERE organisms.name = partial_ordering.name(+) ORDER BY partial_ordering.rank, organisms.name

sqlQuery.name: withGenes
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT organisms.name AS term, (SELECT apidb.tab_to_string(CAST(COLLECT(trim(to_char(taxon_id))) AS apidb.varchartab), ', ') AS internal FROM sres.taxon CONNECT BY prior taxon_id = parent_id START WITH taxon_id = organisms.internal_taxon) AS internal FROM (SELECT tn.name, t.taxon_id AS internal_taxon FROM sres.TaxonName tn, sres.taxon t WHERE tn.name_class='scientific name' AND t.taxon_id = tn.taxon_id AND t.rank = 'species' AND t.taxon_id IN (SELECT taxon_id FROM sres.taxon CONNECT BY taxon_id = prior parent_id START WITH taxon_id IN (SELECT ns.taxon_id FROM dots.NaSequence ns, dots.GeneFeature gf WHERE gf.na_sequence_id = ns.na_sequence_id))) organisms, (SELECT 'Cryptosporidium hominis' AS name, 1 AS rank FROM dual UNION SELECT 'Cryptosporidium parvum' AS name, 2 AS rank FROM dual UNION SELECT 'Plasmodium falciparum' AS name, 3 AS rank FROM dual UNION SELECT 'Plasmodium vivax' AS name, 4 AS rank FROM dual UNION SELECT 'Plasmodium yoelii' AS name, 5 AS rank FROM dual) partial_ordering WHERE organisms.name = partial_ordering.name(+) ORDER BY partial_ordering.rank, organisms.name

sqlQuery.name: withEC
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT organisms.name AS term, (SELECT apidb.tab_to_string(CAST(COLLECT(trim(to_char(taxon_id))) AS apidb.varchartab), ', ') AS internal FROM sres.taxon CONNECT BY prior taxon_id = parent_id START WITH taxon_id = organisms.internal_taxon) AS internal FROM (SELECT tn.name, t.taxon_id AS internal_taxon FROM sres.TaxonName tn, sres.taxon t WHERE tn.name_class='scientific name' AND t.taxon_id = tn.taxon_id AND t.rank = 'species' AND t.taxon_id IN (SELECT taxon_id FROM sres.taxon CONNECT BY taxon_id = prior parent_id START WITH taxon_id IN (SELECT taxon_id FROM dots.AaSequence aas, dots.AaSequenceEnzymeClass asec WHERE aas.aa_sequence_id = asec.aa_sequence_id))) organisms, (SELECT 'Cryptosporidium hominis' AS name, 1 AS rank FROM dual UNION SELECT 'Cryptosporidium parvum' AS name, 2 AS rank FROM dual UNION SELECT 'Plasmodium falciparum' AS name, 3 AS rank FROM dual UNION SELECT 'Plasmodium vivax' AS name, 4 AS rank FROM dual UNION SELECT 'Plasmodium yoelii' AS name, 5 AS rank FROM dual) partial_ordering WHERE organisms.name = partial_ordering.name(+) ORDER BY partial_ordering.rank, organisms.name

sqlQuery.name: cp-tg
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT organisms.name AS term, (SELECT apidb.tab_to_string(CAST(COLLECT(trim(to_char(taxon_id))) AS apidb.varchartab), ', ') AS internal FROM sres.taxon CONNECT BY prior taxon_id = parent_id START WITH taxon_id = organisms.internal_taxon) AS internal FROM (SELECT tn.name, t.taxon_id AS internal_taxon FROM sres.TaxonName tn, sres.taxon t WHERE tn.name_class='scientific name' AND t.taxon_id = tn.taxon_id AND t.rank = 'species' AND tn.name IN ('Cryptosporidium parvum')) organisms ORDER BY organisms.name

SELECT organisms.name AS term, (SELECT apidb.tab_to_string(CAST(COLLECT(trim(to_char(taxon_id))) AS apidb.varchartab), ', ') AS internal FROM sres.taxon CONNECT BY prior taxon_id = parent_id START WITH taxon_id = organisms.internal_taxon) AS internal FROM (SELECT tn.name, t.taxon_id AS internal_taxon FROM sres.TaxonName tn, sres.taxon t WHERE tn.name_class='scientific name' AND t.taxon_id = tn.taxon_id AND t.rank = 'species' AND tn.name IN ('Toxoplasma gondii')) organisms ORDER BY organisms.name
SELECT name AS term, taxon_id AS internal FROM sres.taxonname WHERE name IN ('none at all')

sqlQuery.name: withPlasmoGenes
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT organisms.name AS term, (SELECT apidb.tab_to_string(CAST(COLLECT(trim(to_char(taxon_id))) AS apidb.varchartab), ', ') AS internal FROM sres.taxon CONNECT BY prior taxon_id = parent_id START WITH taxon_id = organisms.internal_taxon) AS internal FROM (SELECT tn.name, t.taxon_id AS internal_taxon FROM sres.TaxonName tn, sres.taxon t WHERE tn.name_class='scientific name' AND t.taxon_id = tn.taxon_id AND t.rank = 'species' AND tn.name like 'Plasmodium %' AND t.taxon_id IN (SELECT taxon_id FROM sres.taxon CONNECT BY taxon_id = prior parent_id START WITH taxon_id IN (SELECT ns.taxon_id FROM dots.NaSequence ns, dots.GeneFeature gf WHERE gf.na_sequence_id = ns.na_sequence_id))) organisms, (SELECT 'Cryptosporidium hominis' AS name, 1 AS rank FROM dual UNION SELECT 'Cryptosporidium parvum' AS name, 2 AS rank FROM dual UNION SELECT 'Plasmodium falciparum' AS name, 3 AS rank FROM dual UNION SELECT 'Plasmodium vivax' AS name, 4 AS rank FROM dual UNION SELECT 'Plasmodium yoelii' AS name, 5 AS rank FROM dual) partial_ordering WHERE organisms.name = partial_ordering.name(+) ORDER BY partial_ordering.rank, organisms.name

sqlQuery.name: tg-pf
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT name AS term, taxon_id AS internal FROM sres.taxonname WHERE name IN ('none at all')

SELECT organisms.name AS term, (SELECT apidb.tab_to_string(CAST(COLLECT(trim(to_char(taxon_id))) AS apidb.varchartab), ', ') AS internal FROM sres.taxon CONNECT BY prior taxon_id = parent_id START WITH taxon_id = organisms.internal_taxon) AS internal FROM (SELECT tn.name, t.taxon_id AS internal_taxon FROM sres.TaxonName tn, sres.taxon t WHERE tn.name_class='scientific name' AND t.taxon_id = tn.taxon_id AND t.rank = 'species' AND tn.name IN ('Toxoplasma gondii')) organisms ORDER BY organisms.name

SELECT organisms.name AS term, (SELECT apidb.tab_to_string(CAST(COLLECT(trim(to_char(taxon_id))) AS apidb.varchartab), ', ') AS internal FROM sres.taxon CONNECT BY prior taxon_id = parent_id START WITH taxon_id = organisms.internal_taxon) AS internal FROM (SELECT tn.name, t.taxon_id AS internal_taxon FROM sres.TaxonName tn, sres.taxon t WHERE tn.name_class='scientific name' AND t.taxon_id = tn.taxon_id AND t.rank = 'species' AND tn.name IN ('Plasmodium falciparum')) organisms ORDER BY organisms.name

sqlQuery.name: pf
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT name AS term, taxon_id AS internal FROM sres.taxonname WHERE name IN ('none at all')

SELECT organisms.name AS term, (SELECT apidb.tab_to_string(CAST(COLLECT(trim(to_char(taxon_id))) AS apidb.varchartab), ', ') AS internal FROM sres.taxon CONNECT BY prior taxon_id = parent_id START WITH taxon_id = organisms.internal_taxon) AS internal FROM (SELECT tn.name, t.taxon_id AS internal_taxon FROM sres.TaxonName tn, sres.taxon t WHERE tn.name_class='scientific name' AND t.taxon_id = tn.taxon_id AND t.rank = 'species' AND tn.name IN ('Plasmodium falciparum')) organisms ORDER BY organisms.name

sqlQuery.name: pb
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT name AS term, taxon_id AS internal FROM sres.taxonname WHERE name IN ('none at all')

SELECT organisms.name AS term, (SELECT apidb.tab_to_string(CAST(COLLECT(trim(to_char(taxon_id))) AS apidb.varchartab), ', ') AS internal FROM sres.taxon CONNECT BY prior taxon_id = parent_id START WITH taxon_id = organisms.internal_taxon) AS internal FROM (SELECT tn.name, t.taxon_id AS internal_taxon FROM sres.TaxonName tn, sres.taxon t WHERE tn.name_class='scientific name' AND t.taxon_id = tn.taxon_id AND t.rank = 'species' AND tn.name IN ('Plasmodium berghei')) organisms ORDER BY organisms.name
